text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Majursahi (ମଜୁରସାହି) | native_name = | settlement_type = Village (ଗାଁ) | image_skyline = IMG-20180203-WA0010.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Maa Banjari Temple | pushpin_map = India Odisha#India | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = India | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = Odisha | subdivision_type2 = District | subdivision_name2 = Kalahandi | subdivision_type3 = Sub division | subdivision_name3 = Dharmagarh | subdivision_type4 = Tehsil/Block/PS | subdivision_name4 = Koksara|| subdivision_type5 = Panchayat | subdivision_name5 = Phupagaon| | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1500 | population_as_of = 2001 | timezone1 = IST | utc_offset1 = +05:30 | postal_code_type = Pincode | postal_code =766019 | footnotes = }} Majursahi (ମଜୁରସାହି) is a village of Koksara Block in Dharmagarh sub-division in Kalahandi District in Odisha State. This village comes under Phupagaon panchayat of Kokasara Tehsil in Kalahandi District. . Majursahi is 6.5 km distance from Koksara and 60 km distance from its district main city Bhawanipatna and 333 km distance from the State's main city Bhubaneswar. == Demographics == According to census 2001, total population of Majursahi was 1,000. == Education == ; Schools nearby Majursahi * Majursahi primary school * Majursahi M.E school * saraswati sihu mandir kusumkhunti * Phupagaon M.E school * Phupagaon High School ; Colleges nearby Majursahi * I V College Jaipatna * Ladugaon Higher Secondary School, Ladugaon * Panchayat Samiti Degree College, Koksara * L.A. +2 Junior College, Behera == References == * http://schools.yorakul.com/kalahandi/21260905801/majursahi-u.p.s..html * http://www.icbse.com/schools/majursahi-u-p-s/21260905801 * https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/Majursahi/@19.654035,82.740641,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x422f3605a8a3b800?sa=X&ved;=0ahUKEwjc5KXiyIfZAhXCP48KHYiKA60Q_BIIaDAK * https://or.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E0%AC%AE%E0%AC%9C%E0%AD%81%E0%AC%B0%E0%AC%B8%E0%AC%BE%E0%AC%B9%E0%AC%BF * www.veethi.com › Places › Majursahi, Orissa * http://www.odishahelpline.com/MAJURSAHI-village-PHUPGAON-panchayat-KOKSARA-block-KALAHANDI-district-ODISHA050237180232130111236049 * http://www.odishahelpline.com/schools-MAJURSAHI-UPS-PHUPGAON-KALAHANDI-district-ODISHA059082117025164142022205 * https://allindiafacts.com/school/odisha/kalahandi/koksara/21260905801.html * http://www.neighbourhoodinfo.co.in/school-detail/Majursahi-U-p-s--School-21260905801 * http://acadym.com/School/1279789/MAJURSAHI-UPS-MAJURSAHI-KALAHANDI * https://vidhyant.com/schools/1880281/Majursahi-U-P-S Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2018 Category:Villages in Odisha
